name: WebGLRenderingContext.deleteProgram
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.deleteProgram() method of the WebGL API deletes a given WebGLProgram object. This method has no effect if the program has already been deleted.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'deleteProgram' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDeleteProgram' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
